item.title: VBXE and Ultimate 1MB success!
item.description:
After several hours of troubleshooting and beating on it, I'm proud to show off my successful installation of the VBXE along with an Ultimate 1M:

It feels weird using the 800XL on an VGA LCD screen, almost like I'm in emulation. To convert the VBXE output to VGA I'm using â€¦
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
